bibl.title: Kleomenes von Naukratis. Probleme eines hellenistischen Wirtschaftsstils. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Kleomenes of Naukratis has often been regarded as a type of Hellenistic economist. Indeed, his actions in Egypt 330-323 B.C. transferred the principles of the Greek city economy to a fertile and vast land. Interpretation of the main sources.
bibl.seg: Kloft Hans, Kleomenes von Naukratis. Probleme eines hellenistischen Wirtschaftsstils. Avec résumé en anglais.

Kleomenes of Naukratis has often been regarded as a type of Hellenistic economist. Indeed, his actions in Egypt 330-323 B.C. transferred the principles of the Greek city economy to a fertile and vast land. Interpretation of the main sources.
